meanings.definition: Fitted with a tube or tubes.
meanings.sent1: The tubulated container had a long tube attached for pouring.
meanings.sent2: The tubulated pipes were designed to carry water efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The tubulated vase looked like a science experiment gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, tubulated with colorful straws, stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The tubulated design of the building made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: To fit with a tube or tubes.
meanings.sent1: The plumber tubulated the new sink for better drainage.
meanings.sent2: She tubulated the wires to prevent tangling.
meanings.sent3: The chef tubulated the pastry bag to decorate the cake.
meanings.sent4: He tubulated the telescope to enhance its magnification.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic tubulated the exhaust system for improved performance.
